summary: A mysterious gang of bikers is on a robbing spree. ACP Jai gets Ali, a mechanic, to assist him in the case. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to nab the thieves red-handed.
cast: Abhishek Bachchan|John Abraham|Uday Chopra|Esha Deol|Rimi Sen|Manoj Joshi|Sanjay M. Singh|Amir Farid|Mehul Bhojak|Rohit Chopra|Palash Dutta|Sanjay Keni|Ayesha Raza|Mukesh Ahuja|Arav Chowdharry|Ashwin Kaushik|Bhupinder|Yusuf Hussain|Perizaad Zorabian|Arjun Sablok|Bhupindder Bhoopii|Ajay Padhye
title: Dhoom
